name: Agonizing Blast
description: Add your Charisma modifier to the damage of your Eldritch Blast cantrip.

name: Armor of Shadows
description: You can cast Mage Armor on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

name: Beast Speech
description: You can cast Speak with Animals at will, without expending a spell slot.

name: Beguiling Influence
description: You gain proficiency in Deception and Persuasion skills.

name: Bond of the Talisman
description: When wearing your talisman, you can teleport to its bearer or have them teleport to you.

name: Devil's Sight
description: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

name: Eldritch Mind
description: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell.

name: Eldritch Sight
description: You can cast Detect Magic at will, without expending a spell slot.

name: Fiendish Vigor
description: You can cast False Life on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a spell slot or material components.

name: Gaze of Two Minds
description: You can use your action to touch a willing humanoid and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn.

name: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones
description: Whenever you regain hit points while your familiar is within 100 feet of you, treat any dice rolled for healing as having rolled their maximum value.

name: Grasp of Hadar
description: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can move that creature closer to you.

name: Improved Pact Weapon
description: You can use any weapon you summon with your Pact of the Blade feature as a spellcasting focus.

name: Lance of Lethargy
description: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can reduce that creature's speed by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

name: Mask of Many Faces
description: You can cast Disguise Self at will, without expending a spell slot.

name: Repelling Blast
description: When you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can push the creature away from you.

name: Thief of Five Fates
description: You can cast Bane once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

name: Ascendant Step
description: You can cast Levitate on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

name: Gift of the Depths
description: You can breathe underwater, and you can cast Water Breathing once without expending a spell slot.

name: Maddening Hex
description: As a bonus action, you cause psychic disturbance around the target cursed by your Hex spell or a warlock feature.
prerequisites: Hex spell or a warlock feature that curses

name: Minions of Chaos
description: You can cast Conjure Elemental once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

name: Mire the Mind
description: You can cast Slow once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

name: Otherworldly Leap
description: You can cast Jump on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

name: Protection of the Talisman
description: When the wearer of your talisman fails a saving throw, they can add a d4 to the roll, potentially turning the save into a success.

name: Sign of Ill Omen
description: You can cast Bestow Curse once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

name: Tomb of Levistus
description: As a reaction when you take damage, you can entomb yourself in ice, gaining temporary hit points.

name: Relentless Hex
description: You can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of the target cursed by your Hex spell or a warlock feature.
prerequisites: Hex spell or a warlock feature that curses

name: Dreadful Word
description: You can cast Confusion once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

name: Bewitching Whispers
description: You can cast Compulsion once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

name: Sculptor of Flesh
description: You can cast Polymorph once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

name: Master of Myriad Forms
description: You can cast Alter Self at will, without expending a spell slot.

name: Whispers of the Grave
description: You can cast Speak with Dead at will, without expending a spell slot.

name: Chains of Carceri
description: You can cast Hold Monster at will, targeting a celestial, fiend, or elemental.

name: Shroud of Shadow
description: You can cast Invisibility at will, without expending a spell slot.

name: Eldritch Smite
description: Once per turn when you hit a creature with your Pact weapon, you can expend a warlock spell slot to deal extra force damage and knock the target prone.

name: Lifedrinker
description: When you hit a creature with your pact weapon, the creature takes extra necrotic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
